title: Kuo: Apple could release a speedier 30W charger with redesigned form-factor
content:
After creating a Twitter account last week, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo is full of predictions on the platform, as he has just shared that the Cupertino company could be readying a new 30W charger for its products.

moreâ€¦

The post Kuo: Apple could release a speedier 30W charger with redesigned form-factor appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo believes the Cupertino company could be readying a new 30W charger with a redesign for its products.
